messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Sapphire Shadows Scheme DATE: 04/04/57 The courtroom buzzed with a mix of curiosity and anxiety as the trial commenced. The prosecution called upon the officers crucial to the investigation to share their testimonies. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: PROSECUTOR: Please state your name and role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Lieutenant A. B. Allen, the lead investigator of this case. PROSECUTOR: Thank you, Lieutenant Allen. Can you elucidate the events on the night the scheme was uncovered? WITNESS: Certainly. On the night of October 10th, Officer C. D. Brown detected unusual activity in the Sapphire Museum and reported it. We began the investigation immediately. PROSECUTOR: Who was assigned to the forensic examination? WITNESS: Sergeant E. F. Cook and Technician G. H. Davis managed the forensic analysis. PROSECUTOR: Who were in charge of the interrogations? WITNESS: Detectives I. J. Evans and K. L. Ford led the interrogations of suspects and potential witnesses. PROSECUTOR: Thank you. No further questions. The Defense launched a cross-examination of Lieutenant Allen regarding the investigative approach adopted. During the trial, Patrol Officers M. N. Green, O. P. Hill, and Q. R. Isaac were also summoned to testify.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.
